name: K-Rolik
description:
K-Rolik - is a rock-rabbit shoot'em up with a glasse'z, tv'z, skeletonz, creaturez, barrelz, wheelz, weaponz, grenadez, boarz, bossez and other'z...
K-Rolik - is a shoot'em up with tons of enemies, with realistic physics in 3D game world. Also: some stages, bosses, weapons.Key Features
  • Mouse control only;
  • 3d game world;
  • Realistic physics;
  • Energy music;
  • Different player weapons;
  • Tons of enemies;
  • Bosses;
  • 5 player lives;
  • Any screen resolutions;
  • Achievements.
Bonuses:Back Fire Cover:Real Physics Grenade:Machine Gun:Shield:
